item.description: 特斯拉公司的Cybertruck今年首次有资格获得高达7500美元的美国税收抵免，这是根据1月1日生效的更严格规定进行的重新调整的一部分，这些规定也新近取消了其他电动汽车获得联邦补贴的资格。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s Cybertruck qualifies for up to $7,500 in US tax credits for the first time this year, part of reshuffling under tougher rules that took effect on Jan. 1 that also newly disqualify other electric vehicles for federal subsidies.】

item.title: 拜登将在特朗普上任前阻止更多海上石油钻探
item.description: 乔-拜登总统正准备颁布一项法令，永久禁止在美国一些沿海水域开发新的近海石油和天然气，在他入主白宫的最后几周里，锁定对敏感海域难以撤销的保护。【原文：President Joe Biden is preparing to issue a decree permanently banning new offshore oil and gas development in some US coastal waters, locking in difficult-to-revoke protections for sensitive marine areas during his final weeks in the White House.】

item.title: 深冻将导致美国部分地区气温骤降
item.description: 本月，美国中部和东部地区的强烈寒潮将使气温骤降至比正常气温低 20 华氏度（11 摄氏度）之多，引发冰风暴，可能导致电线瘫痪，并阻断从中西部到大西洋中部的交通。【原文：Waves of intense cold will send temperatures plunging as much as 20F (11C) below normal across the central and eastern US this month, triggering ice storms that could down power lines and snarl travel from the Midwest to the Mid-Atlantic.】
